Gi3RXLdMA2zkt45cAmFckg.text: I came here over the weekend to check this place out and I was pleased with the food, but dissatisfied with my service. It took a while for my food to come and my server clearly was taking on too much at once. The food was amazing but the service quality was poor. Get your staff up. I've been working in the restaurant industry for years, and for the volume of people, they don't have enough workers.

zABr6eQ3JPM0upi48Bf-Zg.text: I was with a group of 4 other people and we were excited about trying this new place out. We were celebrating, so we were eager to try out the milkshakes that have been all over social media, but first we had drinks, apps, and our meal. Our experience started out fine. The service was kind of slow (15 minutes to get drinks and forgot to put in our appetizer) and half of our group had ordered the Mahi sandwich, which they were apparently out of, which was disappointing. but overall all the drinks were extremely tasty and the food was pretty good (although the calamari and waffle fries could have been fried longer). Our favorite was the dive sauce and sweet potato fries. Then we ordered a round of the XXX Milkshakes (what we had originally came here for). Apparently it was "Media Day" and these bloggers or whatnot started showing up right after we placed our order, which apparently means that everyone dropped everything to cater to them while they wandered around taking photos of everything. Our table was right next to their section of tables, so we got to watch while they got food, drinks, more food and more drinks, while 30 minutes after placing our order, we still had nothing and hadn't seen our server in that long either. By this point, we had been there more than 2 hours and eventually I went to the hostess stand to cancel our order and just get the check. When our waitress finally came over, her excuse was "they didn't have a milkshake maker in house that day".....Isn't that what you're trying to be known for?  We were extremely disappointed and for a celebration dinner, it was very anticlimactic and did not end on a good note.

dsLSpsR3fk4taHpj-TcgkQ.text: I went with a group of 7 friends on Saturday night around 5pm, and was seated immediately despite assuming we'd have to wait. I checked the reviews for recommended items, and chose the bacon cheeseburger. Needless to say, it did not disappoint. The burger was juicy and flavorful, and the toasted bun was tasty as well. Other people at the table got it as well, and had similar reviews. The seasoned fries were also on point, along with the sauce they provided which is akin to mayo/ketchup mixture and provides a great option to dip fries in as well as add to your burger if you choose. I chose to drink water, but the other folks said that the drinks were worth it. The waitress was very attentive, and not overbearing. It was overall a great experience, and would definitely recommend it. I hope it beats the odds of that location unlike the previous 2 tenants, and with the food quality, I see no reason it can't last long.

sFhsXn1BbLNYm4j8PSOPPw.text: Amazing!  I'm not a fan of bars, but I absolutely love Rosemont.  I went on a Saturday night around 9pm with 2 of my friends.  It took us 30 minutes to be seated which was understandable since they were packed.  The food was great!  I order medium wings and I loved them.  My friends ordered sweet potato fries, a side salad, and macaroni and cheese.  They absolutely loved their food as well.  The staff was very nice.  There were very sweet ladies that walked to each table to collect plates when the waitress was busy.  Our waitress, Morgan, was so sweet, helpful, and knowledgeable.  The drinks.... were simply AMAZING!  I ordered the peach drink that comes in a pouch similar to a capri sun and I loved it.  I ordered a total of three that night lol.  Parking was a little difficult but the bar is located in South End, the food and drinks are amazing, and they're usually busy so I wasn't surprised nor did I mind waiting.  I'll definitely be returning to Rosemont on a regular basis.  For those complaining about the wait time.. you can't blame the bar for having great food and a comfortable environment.  No one wants to leave! :)

WNv4qqXc_pfXn4wpE2_lFQ.text: Not bad but the menu really isn't anything special. It features burgers, common bar snacks like nachos and deep fried pickles, and specialty shakes for dessert. Nothing really made poorly, but all of this can be found done better at many restaurants all over Charlotte. Trying to be an upscale version of the late, lamented Penguin may not be the best idea. Then again, maybe this area needs something basic and average. Not sure. But any menu as unimaginative as this is going to suffer as long as the gas station across the street has better food. It did when Wu's was there and it still does now. My advice? Eat at the gas station.

u4fq-Z2748QXjgLMIi7srg.text: I loveeee this place. The prices are good and they have awesome drink specials! Would also recommend the Mac n cheese it's only like 3$ and you get a good portion. The Capri sun style mixed drinks are also amazing (get the peach flavor)! New favorite spot in CLT.

uPNGB4tdx7NENWye7gK3TA.text: First time at Rosemont. I got a table for 3 others and myself. I was waiting alone and it took 14 minutes before the waitress even approached my table. It took another 10 minutes before I received my water and coke. It was not that busy.   Fast forward to when we get our food. We had the fish sandwich, calamari, and Mac and cheese. HOLY SALT. All we could taste. Super disappointed that I had to spend $30 on subpar food and subpar service. I won't spend my money here again

tF6ESUZDnS6v7iuel3qbPA.text: HORRIBLE SERVICE!!! The food is average. Fries were cold, Mac and cheese was watery, and the bologna sandwich was extremely salty and had very little onions, chili and cheese on it.  The lettuce in the salad looked like it had been sitting in dressing for hours. The wings were decent.        I can not explain how bad our server was. I won't put her name on here but our experience started with waters that tasted way to chlorinated.  We asked for new ones from the soda machine as that water would be filtered. We were told it was, but she brought new ones and amazingly they tasted much better.  Our drinks were empty for most of our meal. One person would get ask for a drink and before anyone could say anything to her about other drinks she turned away and disappeared.  Literally we were never asked if we wanted a refill, we had to ask ourselves.  Having been a server myself I feel like waiting tables 101 is to ask if everyone else is ok before walking away.        Overall the dining experience tonight will forever put this place off my radar for food or drinks. Hopefully they get their POS system fixed as well cause the charge is to a place called WU's which I didn't eat at.

uIFzRjx4g8mVKbqh3CEvBw.text: This place is a damn shame. A new concept that is falling flat on its face.  Slow service. Poor management. Underwhelming Food. Unprofessional Staff.  With any luck, they can sell this prime location to a serious owner and management staff in the near future.  We went here as a group of 4 on a Friday night and waited 30 minutes for an open table (no big deal). We received a text that our table was ready and we went back to the front.   The hostess was too busy taking care of a drunk waitress that was in the process of trying to fight her boyfriend. We waited an additional 10 minutes before we were able to flag down the hostess. We were then seated and waited another 15 minutes for a waitress to show up. Following the trend, drinks took another 15 minutes, and our appetizers took another 20. The staff then brought out our order again, accidentally doubling our order.  Meanwhile, the drunk waitress was screaming at her boyfriend and multiple patrons while the manager and bouncer scratch their heads and wonder what to do. She eventually gets kicked out but continues to walk back in and start a fight. This happens a few more times. Eventually half of the bar is watching this unfold and neither the bouncer nor manager give a damn.   This place has a ton of potential, but the terrible service, poor management, and overall disregard for their image is embarrassing.  I would rather suggest McDonalds or Waffle House to anyone who asked.

yirlUVBwSdaTNjj412BnHQ.text: We are 0/2 with this place. First time we went, took 15 mins before a hostess even acknowledged us. They were newly opened and unorganized, but that happens, so we figured we would give it another shot. Fast forward to today when they've been established for some time now. We get there, hour wait for our table which is fine, so we head to the back bar. The outside bar is manned by only two people, so the line accumulates very quickly. They ended up losing my friend's credit card, finally realizing that after a 15 minute search holding up the entire line. Average time to get a drink/close a tab was probably 30 minutes for this bar.   The worst part is when I went to check on our table status after about an hour. I spoke to the hostess who told me that no tables were being sat until the owners table (of probably 30-40 people, little league team party) got their food. We are waiting as 4-5 tables sit empty so the owners of the place can get their service before their patrons. I guess this place will follow the success of Wu's.

eq-vxwUDcrFw5ZRpmxHOuw.text: Such a great vibe. Came to watch the basket ball game with friends, and it was a great experience! Drinks were delicious

vZpc_Z1aeTr9YHthF3YrhQ.text: A group of us went to the Rosemont on the first night of its opening. We showed up at 5 so had a table inside (thankfully since it rained). In my experience with new restaurants in Charlotte, they usually struggle with the first night. . .not Rosemont. They nailed it. We had an incredible waitress, Lexi. She was very attentive, checked in on us at the right times, made sure our drinks were never empty - awesome service! The food was really good too. We had the fries and shrimp snack - so good - and then I had the salad with Mahi. The atmosphere of the restaurant was really neat and the band was strong. My one and biggest complaint is the band was so loud we couldn't talk to each other. I would highly recommend the band start after dinner hours. We were literally screaming at each other. Look forward to enjoying this neighborhood joint more!

ThvpSHXqWeYeX5eYXzVK2g.text: Best bartender. Very nice and good at her job.kayla rules.the food is great and only outmatched by the service

ZyPAiarxopTSUt7dZRnpjg.text: Get the Big burger! They are not joking about it being big and it's only a dollar more. Big shout out to Bethany worked hard to help us out--fantastic place!

P8AeoX19hJM4-DAi6XyiaA.text: Food was great! Service however was one of the worst I've experienced.  Walked in and the staff appeared disorganized. The hostess left her stand when we walked in and came back 5 min later and then greeted us. I went thru half my meal without my drink then we ran out of water and ranch. We went through our whole meal without plates for our shared dishes. They also left people's empty plates on surrounding tables just looked sloppy.

r7wlbY4xcZ4Xu4aWKY3Qjw.text: Waited 25 minutes for my milkshake, my server never even came back during that time to see if I wanted to order food or bring me a water or anything. I ordered the nachos with no jalapenos and that was wrong too. Overall a thumbs down and highly disappointed. Sad because I was so excited about this place :(

tXWQ1QvqNGxNPwc42gI7Zg.text: Awesome new place! Great drinks. Adult capri suns!! And try the mac n cheese... heard they have live music on the weekends. Cant wait to visit again.

oDrq81TWEu8Ja7_2x9XVRA.text: Don't waste your time. Or money. My first visit this evening and it was ABSOLUTE TRASH. I got there and despite the fact that there were 7 or 8 servers/hosts at the front, NO ONE acknowledged me for more than 5 minutes. I should have left, but against my better judgment I stayed. Fast forward to ordering. I ordered my food and wanted to add a side of shrimp for $5. I was told I could not and that I had to order the shrimp entree. So, I did. I shouldn't have. The shrimp were overcooked and salty as all get out! I told my server and she still charged me for them!! The waffle fries sucked. They were so bland and soggy. They tasted old. I didn't eat those either. And let's talk about the band. They were so loud that I couldn't hear and my friend and I couldn't even chat together. Basically, if you want good food, great service, and a nice atmosphere, this place isn't it. I definitely won't be back. This place is TRASH!!

otJKOt-YSLST65723JMIrg.text: Had a great experience at Rosemont for lunch. Mac and cheese is super delicious and the drinks are good and cheap too.

n-eHfoSq-8dg8SocuCQGbQ.text: We came on a Friday night less than a month after opening so we knew it would be packed. We waited 20 min at the bar for a drink while our table was getting ready. We got the drinks and went to the patio and chilled for another 15 and then someone called us over saying our table was ready (we were supposed to get a text alert). 10 min after being seated the text alert came through. We ordered some more drinks, the waitress didn't know what a Highball was so we had to explain it to her. She brought back a whiskey and ginger (wrong), but my bf took it. She brought a vodka tonic when I ordered a vodka soda. We ordered food and the waitress didn't write it down. Someone came up to me 15 min after and said they were out of the fried cauliflower for my salad. Then the waitress who took our order came over and said "you guys didn't order food, did you?" And I said "uh, yeah...someone just came and told me you're out of the cauliflower." And she said "oh, okay!" Lol so we get the food and it's alright...bfs fries came 5 min late and my salad (which was supposed to be kale but was definitely arugula) had a dairy dressing when I said hold the feta bc I'm lactose intolerant. I took 6 lactaid pills bc I was starving and needed to eat! The waitress came back and scooped up my lactaid pill wrappers after I finished and said "I didn't even know we had these!" Lolol so...we prob won't come back. The signature cocktails were good so I'll give it a star.

7nA9yyogIo7m5mPO0Pcmgw.text: Didn't have the food here but they have a lot of good drinks. You can't beat adult Capri Suns and frozen drinks, or $5 Tito's. Great value!

JvlO4Gtl3vuIKZvAcxqU5g.text: Went here with a friend for lunch. I had the buffalo chicken wrap with sweet potato fries. It was delish. The buffalo chicken was seasoned just right not too spicy. I want to return and try one of those adult Capri Sun drinks and the birthday cake milkshake. I definitely recommend this place. The atmosphere and music was very nice for a lunch,  so I can only image the atmosphere at night.  The servers were very nice and helpful. They have a live band sometimes on the weekend. Check it out!

U3E9xWBf5pn5t-u8GHszEA.text: The food was pretty good but there was no salt on the fries at all and our server was super rude to us and snapped at us whenever we asked for something else or asked a question about the food.

MryMtSp_5vXDOfvzVeibDg.text: Great experience! My boyfriend and I went here on a Friday ("honky tonk day"). I got a chicken kale salad and it was delicious. My boyfriend got the chilli cheeseburger and loved it. Drinks were also great. Definitely check it out.
